title: How to qualify a claim in an essay - Quora

response.answer_text: Evidence. You have to ensure that you refer to outside sources that have verified the information properly. Usually, the safest bet is to search for peer-reviewed articles/research published in academic journals. Ensure that you refer to the authors/researchers and cite your source as needed both in the body of the essay as well as at the end on your works cited page. Some professors and readers also prefer that you include the credentials of the author. For example, this may look like: Jane Doe, who researches at {famous university}, discovered “{quoted material}”
